question.body: What is the main function of hair on the eyebrows?

multiple_choice.choice: Prevent sweat from entering the eye

response.feedback: Incorrect. This is a function of eyelashes and nose hair.
Incorrect. The eyebrows are more of a physical barrier above the eye.
Incorrect. Although hair can have sensory function,that is not the main function of the eyebrows.
Correct. The eyebrows help to prevent sweat and other particles from getting in the eye.
